About Me

  • Name: Xinyu Liu
  • Email: lxytopology@163.com

I am a Master's student in the Department of Mathematics at Capital Normal University (CNU) in Beijing.

My core academic passions are Stable Homotopy Theory, Category Theory, and Chromatic Homotopy Theory. I am deeply fascinated by the algebraic and structural side of modern topology and am committed to pursuing Ph.D. research in this area.

This website serves as my public learning journal. It's a space for me to log my independent study—documenting notes from texts and papers, organizing key concepts, and tracing my path as I prepare for future research.

I'm always learning and excited about this field. If you share these interests, I'd love to connect and discuss topology!
